text: Sheldon Henry Solow (July 20, 1928 â€“ November 17, 2020) was an American billionaire real estate developer.Jewish Business News: "Time Waits For No Man : Not Even Sheldon Solow" by Clive Minchom August 23, 2013New York Times: "Empire Built by Developer Shows Signs of Distress" by Charles V. Bagli March 31, 2010 Solow had a net worth of $4.4 billion. He was born in New York City. He helped develop the Solow Building near Central Park. Solow died on November 17, 2020 in New York City from lymphoma at the age of 92. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American billionaires Category:American Jews Category:Businesspeople from New York City Category:Cancer deaths in New York City Category:Deaths from lymphoma Category:Jewish billionaires Category:Jewish businesspeople Category:Real estate developers
title: Sheldon Solow
